#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long a,b;
    while(1)
    {
        int c[11]={0},d[11]={0};
        scanf("%ld%ld",&a,&b);
        if(a==0&&b==0)break;
        int i=0;
        while(a>0)
        {
            c[i]=a%10;
            a/=10;
            i++;
        }
        int j=0;
        while(b>0)
        {
            d[j]=b%10;
            b/=10;
            j++;
        }
        int p=0,t=0;
        for(i=0;i<11;i++)
        {
            t+=c[i]+d[i];
            if(t>=10)
            {
                p++;t=1;
            }
            else
                t=0;
        }
        if(p>1)
            printf("%d carry operations.\n\n",p);
        else if(p>0)
            printf("%d carry operation.\n\n",p);
        else
            printf("No carry operation.\n\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
